plot: The story of a filmmaker environmentalist fed up with the waste generated in the film world so he sets out to prove that he can make a Hollywood blockbuster making a film while strictly reusing, recycling and being green.
title: Green Screen
plot_es: The story of a filmmaker environmentalist fed up with the waste generated in the film world so he sets out to prove that he can make a Hollywood blockbuster making a film while strictly reusing, recycling and being green.
plot_en: The story of a filmmaker environmentalist fed up with the waste generated in the film world so he sets out to prove that he can make a Hollywood blockbuster making a film while strictly reusing, recycling and being green.
